scripts.start: npm run docker:start && cd wp-content/themes/core && yarn install && npm run gulp -- dist && npm run gulp -- dev
scripts.dev: cd wp-content/themes/core && npm run gulp -- dev
scripts.dist: cd wp-content/themes/core && npm run gulp -- dist
scripts.server_dist: cd wp-content/themes/core && npm run gulp -- server_dist
scripts.validate: cd wp-content/themes/core && npm run gulp -- validate
